extension.summary: Nakamori gives you the ability to interact with your Shoko collection
extension.description: Nakamori gives you the ability to interact with your Shoko collection for Kodi-enabled devices. You are able to use many of the commands available to Desktop right from inside Kodi, such as marking watched status, voting, rescanning and rehashing files, and more!
extension.disclaimer: If Shoko Server is on a different machine, set up the ip address in Nakamori's settings before starting
extension.news: v2.1.0 () - Nakamori not use purely a new Shoko API v2 Interface to communicate - Shoko Server should be 3.7.0.4 or higher - Code have been clean off any legacy (unused) code - Brand new Search option with local Database to store your favorite 'search query' - Added 'The coast of seven leages in Kamakura' as New Search Art - Added 'Red Fuji southern wind clear morning' as Clear Search Art - Added icons for Search History (#18) - Ignore Vote_All setting when you already voted on object (#185) - Added Trakt support (via Shoko APIv2) (#33) - Disable gzip on localhost (#161)
